problems.title: Minimum Flips to Make a OR b Equal to c (Bit Manipulation)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given 3 positives numbers a, b and c. Return the minimum flips required in some bits of a and b to make ( a OR b == c ). (bitwise OR operation).
Flip operation consists of change any single bit 1 to 0 or change the bit 0 to 1 in their binary representation.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2 6 5

Sample Output
3

Explanation: After flips a = 1 , b = 4 , c = 5 such that (a OR b == c)

Sample Input
4 2 7

Sample Output
1

Explanation: Flip one bit in a or b to make (a OR b) == 7.

Sample Input
1 2 3

Sample Output
0

Explanation: (1 OR 2) == 3, no flips needed.
hintsList: Check each bit position. For bit i:
If c[i] == 1 but (a[i] OR b[i]) == 0, need 1 flip. If c[i] == 0 but (a[i] OR b[i]) == 1, need to flip all 1s in a[i] and b[i].
